content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation.
- ElectricityGroup (id 29436) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", and "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warning "out of fuel"; fluid box holds water (≈189.93, temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid system updated to [157579].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; fluid box holds water (≈99.25, temperature 15) operating on fluid_system [157579].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 157579, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 157578, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 157591, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 157590, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 157586, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 157595, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 157594, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 157597, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 157598, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 157599, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inconsistent Fluid System Identifier Usage and Candidate Mismatch:
  - The agent repeatedly attempted connection operations using varied fluid_system identifiers (156915, 156999, 157081, 157165, 157247, 157331, 157413, 157497) near position (-5.5, 19.5). Consolidate on a unified, validated fluid_system identifier to ensure candidate pipe groups are consistently recognized.

• Repeated Unsuccessful Candidate Searches:
  - Multiple successive searches within a 15-tile radius returned 0 candidate pipe groups. Integrate a pre-check for candidate availability before initiating connection attempts to avoid redundant operations.

• Expected Candidate Not Found:
  - Even when using an expected working candidate (fluid_system 157497), no matching pipe group was found. Verify that the candidate’s configuration, spatial parameters, and fluid system alignment are accurate prior to connection execution.
